entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, La Malbaie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
